body:
Hi guys,

I need advice about Honeybee, I got this error when running daylight simulation in Hydra example file

1. Solution exception:Failed to read the results!

rtrace: fatal - (unnamed_RAD.oct): truncated octree



The snapshot attached, any help?

replies.body:
Hi Yasser,



Can you attach your gh file as well ?



Sarith

Hi Sarith,

I use the example file from hydrashare.github

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_III&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0)



any advice?

Thanks

Hi Yasser,



I checked that file on 32bit and 64bit modes on my system and everything works out fine. Did you change/add any inputs from that file? Truncated octrees usually result from errors in how geometry/models are defined.



If you did change the file, can you post your gh file as well?



Sarith
